name: NSColorPicker
desc: An abstract superclass that implements the default color picking protocol.

items.name: init?(pickerMask: Int, colorPanel: NSColorPanel)
items.desc: Initializes the color picker with the specified color panel and color picker mode mask.

items.name: var colorPanel: NSColorPanel
items.desc: The color panel instance that owns the color picker.

items.name: func insertNewButtonImage(NSImage, in: NSButtonCell)
items.desc: Sets the image used for the specified button cell.

items.name: var provideNewButtonImage: NSImage
items.desc: The button image used by the color picker.

items.name: func setMode(NSColorPanel.Mode)
items.desc: Overriden to set the color picker’s mode.

items.name: func attachColorList(NSColorList)
items.desc: Overriden to attach a color list to a color picker.

items.name: func detachColorList(NSColorList)
items.desc: Overriden to detach a color list from a color picker.

items.name: func viewSizeChanged(Any?)
items.desc: Overriden to respond to a size change.

items.name: var buttonToolTip: String
items.desc: The tool tip that is shown when the mouse cursor is over the color picker’s button image.
